document.full_text: american dustin johnson has promised to dazzle south korean crowds with finesse as well as his jaw-dropping length off the tee at this week's co-sanctioned ballantine's championship.
document.title: long bomber johnson ready for korean dust-up
lines_and_colors: american dustin johnson has promised to dazzle south korean crowds with finesse as well as his jaw-dropping length off the tee at this week's co-sanctioned ballantine's championship.
